[vc_row equal_height=”yes” content_placement=”middle” banner=”true” particles=”true” fullheight=”true” el_class=”mobile-center banner-curb”][vc_column css_animation=”none” offset=”vc_col-lg-6 vc_col-md-6″ el_class=”order-lg-first”][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1622353062037{margin-bottom: 35px !important;}”]

LET’S GO TO THE DAM IN A SMART WAY!

Damsmart© is a Binance Smart Chain (BSC) token that innovate of deflated token and never panic sell. Our aim is to make $SMART token become a new high value one by using smart and well prepared strategies. This is reflected in our slogan: “Let’s go to the Dam in a Smart way”.

  • Buy on Pancakeswap
  • Join us on Telegram

[/vc_column_text]

[/vc_column][vc_column css_animation=”none” offset=”vc_col-lg-6 vc_col-md-6″ el_class=”order-first”][vc_column_text el_class=”header-image”][/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_section css=”.vc_custom_1622290139673{padding-top: 80px !important;padding-bottom: 80px !important;background-color: #000e26 !important;}” el_id=”feature”][vc_row][vc_column][vc_row_inner css=”.vc_custom_1622375093945{margin-bottom: 50px !important;}”][vc_column_inner]

SPECIAL FEATURE FEATURE

[/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner css=”.vc_custom_1622374758826{margin-bottom: 20px !important;}”][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″ css=”.vc_custom_1622374935818{margin-bottom: 40px !important;}”][vc_column_text]

No Rugpull

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]

75% of pre-sale BNB will be add to liquidity and locked by DxSale for 6 months.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″ css=”.vc_custom_1622374951135{margin-bottom: 40px !important;}”][vc_column_text]

Dump Prevention Mechanism

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]

DamSmart employ a new Dump Prevention Mechanism so the token’s price always increase!

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″ css=”.vc_custom_1622374964968{margin-bottom: 40px !important;}”][vc_column_text]

Transparency and Trust!

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]

DamSmart employ a new Dump Prevention Mechanism so the token’s price always increase!

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][/vc_section][vc_section el_id=”mechanism” css=”.vc_custom_1622269160297{padding-top: 80px !important;padding-bottom: 80px !important;}”][vc_row][vc_column][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner css=”.vc_custom_1622288400932{margin-bottom: 30px !important;}”]

MECHANISM MECHANISM

[/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner css=”.vc_custom_1622288429894{margin-bottom: 30px !important;}”][vc_column_text]Everyone fear of deflationary, and so do we. In order to prevent the DamSmart token from deflationary, we’ve employed several methods:[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”2/3″]
Daily burn

5% of total token will be burned daily in the first 7 days after launching

Dev token lock

Dev token will be locked for 15 days on dxsale

Pre-sale token lock

Only 10% of presale token are transferred to presale holder. The rest will be locked on dxsale and can only be unlocked under specific criteria.

[/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″][vc_single_image image=”528″ img_size=”medium” alignment=”right”][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][/vc_section][vc_section el_id=”tokenomics” css=”.vc_custom_1622290123837{padding-top: 80px !important;padding-bottom: 80px !important;background-color: #000e26 !important;}”][vc_row][vc_column][vc_row_inner css=”.vc_custom_1622288486309{margin-bottom: 30px !important;}”][vc_column_inner css=”.vc_custom_1622376385040{margin-bottom: 50px !important;}”]

TOKENOMICS TOKENOMICS

[vc_column_text]

For every transaction, these things will happen

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″ css=”.vc_custom_1622376316011{margin-bottom: 40px !important;}”][vc_column_text]

Token Burned

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]

5% token will be burned

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″ css=”.vc_custom_1622376323431{margin-bottom: 40px !important;}”][vc_column_text]

The Longer You Hold,The More You Have

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]

3% of token will be redistributed equally to all holders as a reward.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″ css=”.vc_custom_1622376330067{margin-bottom: 40px !important;}”][vc_column_text]

Automatic Liquidity Pool Adding

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]

5% of token will be added into the liquidity pool.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][/vc_section][vc_section css=”.vc_custom_1622285243726{padding-top: 80px !important;padding-bottom: 80px !important;}” el_id=”distribution”][vc_row][vc_column]

TOKEN DISTRIBUTION DISTRIBUTION

[vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner][vc_column_text]

Total Supply: 1,000,000,000,000,000 $SMART tokens

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner fullwidth=”no” css=”.vc_custom_1622288081630{margin-top: 30px !important;}”][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_round_chart type=”doughnut” style=”modern” stroke_width=”1″ values=”%5B%7B%22title%22%3A%22Twitter%20shilling%20contest%22%2C%22value%22%3A%225000000000000%22%2C%22color%22%3A%22blue%22%7D%2C%7B%22title%22%3A%22Telegram%20shilling%20contest%22%2C%22value%22%3A%2210000000000000%22%2C%22color%22%3A%22pink%22%7D%2C%7B%22title%22%3A%22Reddit%20shilling%20contest%22%2C%22value%22%3A%225000000000000%22%2C%22color%22%3A%22green%22%2C%22custom_color%22%3A%22%23f79468%22%7D%2C%7B%22title%22%3A%22Meme%20contest%22%2C%22value%22%3A%225000000000000%22%2C%22color%22%3A%22turquoise%22%2C%22custom_color%22%3A%22%23ff675b%22%7D%2C%7B%22title%22%3A%22Key%20members%20of%20community%22%2C%22value%22%3A%2215000000000000%22%2C%22color%22%3A%22vista-blue%22%2C%22custom_color%22%3A%22%235aa1e3%22%7D%2C%7B%22title%22%3A%22Air%20drop%22%2C%22value%22%3A%2220000000000000%22%2C%22color%22%3A%22violet%22%2C%22custom_color%22%3A%22%23ff9900%22%7D%2C%7B%22title%22%3A%22Governance%22%2C%22value%22%3A%2240000000000000%22%2C%22color%22%3A%22chino%22%2C%22custom_color%22%3A%22%23f4524d%22%7D%2C%7B%22title%22%3A%22Burn%22%2C%22value%22%3A%2230000000000000%22%2C%22color%22%3A%22orange%22%2C%22custom_color%22%3A%22%235472d2%22%7D%2C%7B%22title%22%3A%22Pre-sale%22%2C%22value%22%3A%22750000000000000%22%2C%22color%22%3A%22peacoc%22%2C%22custom_color%22%3A%22%2350485b%22%7D%2C%7B%22title%22%3A%22Private%20sale%22%2C%22value%22%3A%22120000000000000%22%2C%22color%22%3A%22green%22%2C%22custom_color%22%3A%22%23f7f7f7%22%7D%5D” animation=”easeOutElastic”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][/vc_section][vc_section css=”.vc_custom_1622290103326{padding-top: 80px !important;padding-bottom: 80px !important;background-color: #000e26 !important;}” el_id=”roadmap”][vc_row][vc_column]

ROADMAP ROADMAP

[vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner animate=”fadeIn”]
2021, May

The Beginning

Set up Telegram Release of Integrity Litepaper Launch Website Social Media Launch
2021, Early June

Token Launch

Start Phase 1 Of Marketing - PooCoin Ads, Reddit CMS Posts & Other Popular Subreddits, Twitter Competitions & Giveaways, Daily $100 Telegram Giveaways and more! Launch Integrity Presale Launch Integrity On PancakeSwap Release of full Integrity Whitepaper Apply For Listings on - CoinGecko, CoinMarketCap, Blockfolio, CoinSniper, CoinHunt & Delta
2021, Mid June

Marketing Phase 2

Start Phase 2 Of Marketing - Huge push via Influencer Marketing on Youtube, Twitter, Reddit, Tik Tok and much more Launch YouTube Channel Release Of First Integrity YouTube Video Start Of Integrity Official Subreddit Start Of Integrity Official Discord Server
2021, July

Expansion Of Integrity

Production Of NFTs for Integrity Giveaway Of Exclusive NFTs For Integrity Holders Receive Feedback On CoinGecko, CoinMarketCap & Coinhunt Applications (Estimated) Officially Added Into TrustWallets List of Tokens (Pending 2.5k Holders)
2021, Mid July

Launch Farm

Launch yield farming with profit for holders
[/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][/vc_section][vc_section css=”.vc_custom_1622290019920{padding-top: 80px !important;padding-bottom: 80px !important;}” el_id=”social”][vc_row][vc_column]

JOIN OUR COMMUNITY COMMUNITY

[vc_column_text]

Let’s go to the dam together!

[/vc_column_text][vc_row_inner content_placement=”middle” css=”.vc_custom_1622289925180{margin-top: 30px !important;}”][vc_column_inner width=”1/5″][vc_icon icon_fontawesome=”fab fa-twitter” color=”white” size=”xl” align=”center” link=”url:https%3A%2F%2Ftwitter.com%2FDamsmartorg|target:_blank”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/5″][vc_icon icon_fontawesome=”fab fa-github” color=”white” size=”xl” align=”center” link=”url:https%3A%2F%2Fgithub.com%2Fdamsmart-org|target:_blank”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/5″][vc_icon icon_fontawesome=”fab fa-medium-m” color=”white” size=”xl” align=”center” link=”url:https%3A%2F%2Fdamsmart.medium.com%2F|target:_blank”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/5″][vc_icon type=”entypo” icon_entypo=”entypo-icon entypo-icon-doc-text” color=”white” size=”xl” align=”center” link=”url:https%3A%2F%2Fdamsmart2021.gitbook.io%2Fdamsmart%2F|target:_blank”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/5″][vc_icon icon_fontawesome=”far fa-envelope” color=”white” size=”xl” align=”center” link=”url:http%3A%2F%2Fdamsmart2021%40gmail.com|title:damsmart2021%40gmail.com|target:_blank”][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][vc_column][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″][vc_icon icon_fontawesome=”fas fa-paper-plane” color=”white” size=”xl” align=”center” link=”url:https%3A%2F%2Ft.me%2Fdamsmart_anno|target:_blank”][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1622376575782{padding-bottom: 20px !important;}”]

Telegram chanel

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″][vc_icon icon_fontawesome=”fab fa-telegram” color=”white” size=”xl” align=”center” link=”url:https%3A%2F%2Ft.me%2Fdamsmart|target:_blank”][vc_column_text]
